How do I use the `verus` command to send a transaction to the blockchain?

The `verus` command is not used to send transactions to the blockchain. The example provided shows how to use the `verus` command to get peer information, not send transactions. If you want to send a transaction, you would need to use a different command or method.

Examples:
> verus getpeerinfo 
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getpeerinfo", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
